SEARCH
Package db

Class Database

java.lang.Object
db.Database
public class Database extends Object
The Database class manages database operations such as adding, updating, and removing processes, as well as handling time tracking. It uses a singleton pattern to ensure there is only one instance of the database connection.

    • addProcess

      public void addProcess(ProcessInfo prs)
      Adds a new process to the database for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the process.
      user_id - The ID of the user the process belongs to.

    • updateTime

      public void updateTime(int process_id)
      Updates the last recorded time of a process.
      Parameters:
      process_id - The ID of the process to update.

    • setTimeLimit

      public void setTimeLimit(ProcessInfo prs)
      Sets a time limit for a given process.
      Parameters:
      process_id - The ID of the process.
      time_limit - The time limit to assign (in seconds).

    • getTimeLimit

      public int getTimeLimit(int process_id)
      Retrieves the time limit for a specific process.
      Parameters:
      process_id - The ID of the process to query.
      Returns:
      The time limit assigned to the process (in seconds).

      Retrieves the currently tracked time for a specific process.
      Parameters:
      process_id - The ID of the process to query.
      Returns:
